channel.title: Having an error
channel.description:
In the client run batch file I have:
@echo off title Client color 5e cd ./locandclass/ "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.8.0_45/bin/java" -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
But when I run the client I get this error:
[img]http://s10.postimg.org/qthgz2mfd/rserr.png[/img]

item.title: Having an error
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I’m going to guess your download link isn’t a direct download. Other than that read the error, it cannot find your mapconfig.txt. make sure all your directories are correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Having an error
item.dc:creator: @Knokrnix Knokrnix
item.description:
@Knokrnix wrote:

In the client run batch file I have:

@echo off
title Client
color 5e
cd ./locandclass/
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.8.0_45/bin/java” -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

But when I run the client I get this error:
